alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 09 at 9:29AM EST until January 09 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 915 AM CST. * At 828 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southeast of Marianna, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Jackson County, including the following locations... Grand Ridge, Blue Spring, Union City, Lovedale, Haynes, Sink Creek, Dellwood, Star, Two Egg, and Simsville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
